com.barrysheehan.www

Class Thesaurus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.barrysheehan.www.AbstractThesaurus
      • com.barrysheehan.www.Thesaurus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WordMap

    public class Thesaurus
extends AbstractThesaurus
    Extends AbstractThesaurus and provides methods to build a "thesaurus" wordMap from two .txt files.

    Abstract methods from AbstractThesaurus are implemented and include methods for parsing text files and initialising the values of instance variables dictoinaryString and wordListString.

    Since:
    1.8
    See Also:
    WordMap, AbstractThesaurus

      Constructors

      Thesaurus(java.lang.String pathToDictionaryFile, java.lang.String pathToWordListFile)
      Calls the constructor from super which creates a wordMap using two supplied Strings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void initialiseDictionaryString(java.lang.String pathToTextFile)
      Parses a .txt file and adds its contents to the dictionaryString instance variable.
      protected void initialiseWordListString(java.lang.String pathToTextFile)
      Parses a text file and adds its contents to the wordListString instance variable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Thesaurus

        public Thesaurus(java.lang.String pathToDictionaryFile,
                 java.lang.String pathToWordListFile)
        Calls the constructor from super which creates a wordMap using two supplied Strings.

        Strings supplied are the paths to two text files used to create the wordMap.

        Parameters:
        pathToDictionaryFile - the path to the text file to be used when building the dictionary
        pathToWordListFile - the path to the text file to be used when building a wordMap

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseDictionaryString

        protected void initialiseDictionaryString(java.lang.String pathToTextFile)
        Parses a .txt file and adds its contents to the dictionaryString instance variable.

        If the suppplied path does not lead to a .txt file, or the file can not be read, the user is informed

        Specified by:
        initialiseDictionaryString in class AbstractThesaurus
        Parameters:
        pathToTextFile - the path to a text file to be parsed

      • initialiseWordListString

        protected void initialiseWordListString(java.lang.String pathToTextFile)
        Parses a text file and adds its contents to the wordListString instance variable.

        If the suppplied path does not lead to a .txt file, or the file can not be read, the user is informed

        Specified by:
        initialiseWordListString in class AbstractThesaurus
        Parameters:
        pathToTextFile - the path to a text file to be parsed
